name: Walking with Darkness
description:
You take a walk with a being that gives you a choice with life. 

Thanks for checking out 'Walking with Darkness'

This is a demo to a much more elaborate game I'm currently working on, so if you enjoy it, please keep an eye out for my future works.

This game was created using the game engine Twine, so if you're interested in making your own text game I should recommend trying it out.

https://linktr.ee/JaneAmeliaSherwood
